content:
Dataverse 6.3 is out! We're still working on blog posts, etc, but you can download Dataverse from https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/releases/tag/v6.3

(Plus container images have been updated, the "alpha" tag.)

Nice human-readable summary by @Ceilyn Boyd

https://dataverse.org/blog/dataverse-software-63-release or https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/7bCBVi06qbE/m/dNScsVxUAQAJ
Nice, but missing the appserver and solr update part. :innocent:
"Installations take note: you need to upgrade your Payara and Solr servers"

As discussed in standup just now I took the bullets from @Ceilyn Boyd 's email above and put them in the release notes.

@Oliver Bertuch I also added a bullet about upgrading Payara and Solr. Good idea. Thanks.

https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/releases/tag/v6.3
